item.title: Kinoma Mobile Media Tools
item.description:
The mobile multimedia revolution is here, as evidenced by the constant competition among cell phone manufacturers to deliver bigger screens, better resolution, more memory, and faster wireless speeds. However, Kinoma is changing the game with a new toolset that enhances the capabilities of existing smartphones. At the forefront is Kinoma Play, a multimedia browser and guide. It supports a wide array of video formats, including MPEG-4 Video SP, AVC/H.264, 3GPP (MPEG-4), Flash Video (Sorenson Spark), QuickTime Movie (MPEG-4), and Windows Media 9 (WMV9)...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/kinoma-mobile-media-tools/
